title: The Map and The Stone
description: Rhys is ten years old and he lives, with his mum, in a tiny house on a council estate.Rhys is called a day-dreamer by his teacher at school, and he's always staying behind to finish his work.But, out of the corner of his eye, Rhys can see something moving, in the trees, in the hedges, and then...There's a Darkling on his bed, and it needs his help.Haunted by the dying Darkling, Rhys must find the magical Nexus to find a way home for the last living Darklings.
author: Sarah Barnard
